endpoints.description: Retrieve a comprehensive list of all registered properties.
Submit a new property record for verification and registration.
Fetch detailed information of a specific property using its unique identifier.
Update details related to a registered property.
Remove a specific property's record from the database.
Retrieve the ownership history of a specified property.
Check and verify the legal compliance status of a property.
Fetch all properties located within a specific region.
Obtain a report on compliance checks performed on a property.
Facilitate the transfer of ownership from one entity to another with proper validation.
